name: Warp Zero
description:
Warp Zero is an addictive twist on the bullet hell genre. Having trouble dodging bullets'? Try Slo-mo. Yes, you are able to slow down time, but you still keep your normal speed, I'm sure that will help you not get hit. For any question comments or concerns leave a comment on the trailer on YouTube, ill make sure to get back to you and I'd love to see what everyone thinks.

This is my first ever published game, which I gave myself a deadline of a week to make, I hope everyone enjoys it :)

(There are 3 ways to slow down time, press either, E, Space, or Left Click)

-Emerald Dev
